# Purpose

This document tests the time necessary to run all scenarios on a tile.

# Setup

```{r}
write.csv(Sys.time(),file='~/Desktop/start-time.csv')
```

Source the scenarios script. This is simply a wrapper function for loading the data, processing, and simulating emissions. It takes a numeric tile number as input, and saves a .csv of emissions estimates.

```{r}
source("scripts/scenarios/scenarios.R")
```

# Test

Run the function on a tile full of pixels.

```{r}
residue_scenario(657)
write.csv(Sys.time(),file='~/Desktop/end-time.csv')
```
